lines:
1956. a

Ruta

Chinen Legation, 
Washington, D.

Sept. 18th, 1910.

Dear Sir,

of mine, and I have decided to enter 
the Army and Navy Prep in here, 
get. I still sorry about the faileen 
I plannting of Andover. Wiching that 
Hon woned send me a copy of 
catalogue, so I can send to much 
Father, please.

How many Chinese boys 
in Ancover this fall? I think 
later on, there must be many 
would come to enter also.

Hope sometimes later, a 
good news to hear from you 
With best regards.

Truly your Kuan.

Got soun note just this 
evening from the Chinese Gegation, 
and glad to hear that your school 
voon be opened, but much sorry to 
sach hat my degree is pretty bor 
can not to promate in Andoren. 
The roona, so can let one who 
needs, and thank you very many 
for member about mag planting

Mr. Yong Kwain, the guardian

yours
raw: 1956. a  Ruta  Chinen Legation,  Washington, D.  Sept. 18th, 1910.  Dear Sir,  of mine, and I have decided to enter  the Army and Navy Prep in here,  get. I still sorry about the faileen  I plannting of Andover. Wiching that  Hon woned send me a copy of  catalogue, so I can send to much  Father, please.  How many Chinese boys  in Ancover this fall? I think  later on, there must be many  would come to enter also.  Hope sometimes later, a  good news to hear from you  With best regards.  Truly your Kuan.  Got soun note just this  evening from the Chinese Gegation,  and glad to hear that your school  voon be opened, but much sorry to  sach hat my degree is pretty bor  can not to promate in Andoren.  The roona, so can let one who  needs, and thank you very many  for member about mag planting  Mr. Yong Kwain, the guardian  yours

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that he will not be attending Andover and that he will be admitted to the Army and Navy Prep in the Chinese Ligation. He asks how many Chinese boys will be at Andover this year.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
